Scene:
Hanyu Village (See also Hanyu Village from ""The Story of Kasane"")
(Hanyūmura (See also Hanyūmura from ""Meiboku kasane monogatari"") / 埴生村)

Play: The Trouble in the Date Household (伽羅先代萩)

Production: September 1972

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Komatsudayū II (豊竹小松大夫 (二))

Takemoto Koshijidayū IV (竹本越路大夫 (四))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsuhei II (see also Nozawa Kizaemon III) (野澤勝平 (二))

Nozawa Kizaemon II (野澤喜左衛門 (二))
